name: High Rise
description:
High Rise is a game where you must power a high-rise apartment building by pressing the spacebar. Available to you are two upgrades: a worker, who will automatically press the spacebar for you every second, and a boost, which will increase the amount of energy each press of the spacebar produces. 

If you are interested in playing the Ludum Dare 39 submission, download the LD Edition. If you wish to try the more polished HD version, download v2.0.

High Rise was made in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare #39.
